sourcesContent:
product-list works!

{{ product.title }}

Price: {{ product.price }}

Cost Price: {{ product.costprice }}

Product No: {{ product.productno }}

Barcode: {{ product.barcode }}

Created: {{ product.created }}

Color: {{ product.color }}

Style No: {{ product.styleno }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; interface Product { price: number; costprice: number; created: string; title: string; id: number; productno: string; barcode: string; color: string | null; styleno: string | null; } @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'], }) export class ProductListComponent implements OnInit { products: Product[]; currentPage = 0; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.products = []; } nextPage() { this.currentPage++; } prevPage() { this.currentPage--; } ngOnInit() { this.getProducts(); } getProducts() { this.http .get<{ content: Product[] }>('assets/products.json') .subscribe((data) => { this.products = data.content; }); } }
